scripts.build: node "node_modules/@babel/cli/bin/babel.js" src/ -d dist/src/ && node "node_modules/@babel/cli/bin/babel.js" config/ -d dist/config
scripts.destroy-lambda: aws lambda delete-function --function-name final-client-project-node --region eu-west-3 && aws iam delete-role-policy --role-name final-client-project-node-executor --policy-name log-writer --region eu-west-3 && aws iam delete-role --role-name final-client-project-node-executor --region eu-west-3 && rm claudia.json
scripts.create-lambda: npm run build && mv .env .env.dev && mv .env.serverless .env && npx claudia create --handler lambda.handler --deploy-proxy-api --region eu-west-3 --runtime nodejs10.x --timeout 10 && mv .env .env.serverless && mv .env.dev .env
scripts.update-lambda: npm run build && mv .env .env.dev && mv .env.serverless .env && npx claudia update && mv .env .env.serverless && mv .env.dev .env
